meanings.sent1: She lays the book on the table gently.
meanings.sent2: He always lays his keys on the shelf when he comes home.
meanings.sent3: The cat lays the toy mouse at my feet as a gift.
meanings.sent4: The sun lays its warm rays across the field at dawn.

meanings.sent1: The hen lays an egg every morning in the coop.
meanings.sent2: Birds lay eggs in nests to keep them safe.
meanings.sent3: The Easter bunny lays colorful eggs for children to find.
meanings.sent4: The fish lays its eggs in the shallow waters near the shore.
meanings.sent5: The turtle lays its eggs in the sand and covers them up.
